titles.title: Sekai Meisaku Gekijou Kanketsu Ban: Watashi no Ashinaga Ojisan
World Masterpiece Theater Complete Edition: Daddy-Long-Legs
世界名作劇場・完結版 私のあしながおじさん

anime.description: http://anidb.net/ch54556 [Judy] is an orphan girl who lives in the United States at the beginning of the 20th century. She has a gift for writing, and is helped by a mysterious benefactor who gives her the opportunity to study at a private high school with only one condition: she has to write him letters every month, with no expectation of them being responded to. However, she knows nothing about this person, not even his name. As she has heard he is very tall, she nicknames him Daddy Long Legs.

tag.description: A novel is a relatively long work of narrative fiction, normally written in prose form, and which is typically published as a book. Manga, comics, or visual novels do not fit this description and are not considered novels; including a small number of illustrations, however, is still permissible, which means that light novels are considered novels.
